channel.title: Right Clicking then Hitting Kick Prob
channel.description:
Ok, I know I was trying to had full follow.. Then a moderator had told me that he can't kick.. So I went on, i right clicked a person, and the "Follow" took the spot of "Kick". So i went into my files, I deleted everything i did with follow, and then I restarted the server.. Now kick shows, [IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/2wghchf.jpg[/img]
but, it doesn't do anything.. Anyone knows how to make it kick the person?

item.title: Right Clicking then Hitting Kick Prob
item.dc:creator: @x_P_U_R_E_x x P U R E x
item.description:
@x_P_U_R_E_x wrote:

Ok, I know I was trying to had full follow… Then a moderator had told me
that he can’t kick… So I went on, i right clicked a person, and the “Follow”
took the spot of “Kick”. So i went into my files, I deleted everything i did with follow,
and then I restarted the server…
Now kick shows,

but, it doesn’t do anything… Anyone knows how to make it kick the person?

Read full topic
